definition: of or relating to the preservation of peace between hostile groups by international military forces, the activity of keeping the peace with military forces, especially when international military forces enforce a truce between hostile groups or nations
details:
adjective
- of or relating to the preservation of peace between hostile groups by international military forces
= example: of or relating to the preservation of peace between hostile groups by international military forces
noun
- the activity of keeping the peace with military forces, especially when international military forces enforce a truce between hostile groups or nations
= example: the activity of keeping the peace with military forces, especially when international military forces enforce a truce between hostile groups or nations
= synonyms: peacekeeping mission, peacekeeping operation
